name: Never High Noon
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 50 - LD page for ratings and comments: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/never-high-noon

You're set to duel the fastest shot in the west. With no hope of winning you're left with one choice.

Delay High Noon as long as possible.

Shoot The Sun with THE MOUSE to keep it out of the midday sky! You may need to move with WASD to keep your eye on it

Several people in town have taken up the latest hobby of collecting clocks! Shoot any clock before it can strike 12!

--CONTROLS--
WSAD/Arrows -> move

Mouse -> Aim

Mouse Left -> Shoot

--ASSETS AND TOOLS--

- Font -

 Pixel Western Font - By  Mirz123 https://www.dafont.com/pixel-western.font

- Music -
Generated With Abundant Music https://pernyblom.github.io/abundant-music/index.html

-Engine-

Godot

-Artwork created in-

Aesprite https://www.aseprite.org/

-Sounds created with-

Lab Chirp http://labbed.net/software/labchirp/
